title: Thomas Jefferson
subtitle_html: Author of the Declaration of Independence
author: Tom H., who grew up in Virginia
card_content_html: This image of the personality of Thomas Jefferson, one of America's Founding Fathers, shows he is ____________. In 1775 he wrote America's Declaration of Independence, and his Statute for Religious Freedom was put into law in Virginia in 1786. Jefferson served as the third president of the US, from 1801–1809, and in 1825 the Marquis de Lafayette toasted him as the father of the University of Virginia.
card_first_person_html: Thomas Jefferson's image contrasts strongly with Alexander Hamilton's, and they certainly had different backgrounds and temperaments.
